edu.swarthmore.cs.spoon.interfaces

Interface UnexpectedActivity


  • public interface UnexpectedActivity
    An event that might occur when the player tries to perform an Action that costs spoons. UnexpectedActivities might end up costing the player more spoons, giving the player back some spoons, taking an item away from the player, giving the player an item, changing the player's money, or nothing at all.

      • setSpoonCost

        void setSpoonCost(int cost)
        Setter for spoon cost. Spoon cost could be negative for a normal cost, 0 for no spoon cost, or positive for a spoon gain
        Parameters:
        cost - an integer to set the spoon cost to

      • getSpoonCost

      • setMoneyCost

        Setter for money cost. Money cost could be negative for a normal cost, 0 for no money cost, or positive for a money gain
        Parameters:
        moneyCost - an integer to set the money cost to

      • getMoneyCost

        int getMoneyCost()
        Getter for money cost
        Returns:
        an int that is the money cost of this activity

      • setItemCost

        void setItemCost(Item item,
                 int itemCost)
        Setter for item cost. An activity cannot cost multiple types of item. Cost could be negative for a loss of some amount of the specified item, 0 for no cost, or positive for items gained.
        Parameters:
        item - the item to take away (or give to the player if the quantity is positive, or neither if the quantity is 0)
        itemCost - an integer to set the item cost to.

      • getItemCost

        javafx.util.Pair<Item,java.lang.Integer> getItemCost()
        Getter for item cost
        Returns:
        a pair of type Item (for the item gained or lost) and Integer (for the amount gained or lost)

      • setActivityText

        Setter for the text displayed when the activity occurs
        Parameters:
        activityText - a String to display when the activity occurs

      • getActivityText

        java.lang.String getActivityText()
        Getter for the text displayed when the activity occurs
        Returns:
        a String that is displayed when the activity occurs
